section.title: invoices recurring list of List Recurring Invoices
section.para: Invoices may be set as recurring on the "Advanced" tab of the Invoice screen. On that tab you can specify how frequently you want an Invoice to recur—and for how long. For more information, see . Once an Invoice has been made recurring, you can monitor and manage these Invoices on the Recurring Invoices screen. To view the complete list of your recurring Invoices, select the "List Recurring Invoices" option. The following screen will appear:
The recurring Invoices list displays information on all your recurring Invoices, including the Invoice Number, Customer, date, interval, type, duration, and amount.

tip.para: Using the "Edit" option on the right-click menu, you can change the frequency of an Invoice's recurrence. You can also turn off the recurring option on the "Advanced" tab of the Invoice.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Invoice.

Enables you to edit highlighted recurring Invoices. The edit screen is the same as that for selecting a new Invoice—except that when editing, the fields will contain recurring Invoice information. Double-clicking on a recurring Invoice will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a recurring Invoice and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
